name: Simple Birthday Reminder
tagline: Material Android app which keeps track of and reminds users of their loved ones birthdays.
body: ### Simple Birthday Reminder 2.2 Simple Birthday Reminder is an Android app which keeps track of and reminds users of their loved ones birthdays. ![](http://i.imgur.com/yJP9f4O.png)[](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=website.julianrosser.birthdays) ### Features Remembering birthdays has never been so simple! - See a beautifully presented list of upcoming birthdays, each with the date, age and a countdown. - Simple to use, easy to see who is next and how long remains until each birthday. - Material design with many themes and colors to choose from. - Receive a reminder up to two weeks before the date, at the time of your choosing. - No adverts! ![](http://i.imgur.com/PaiXGEV.png)![](http://i.imgur.com/NmQy37X.png) ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Birthday Reminder? [Contact me](mailto:julianrosser91@gmail.com) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out. ### Code The app is open source, [click here](https://github.com/Jules1991/BirthdayReminder) to view this project, or view my other projects here (@jules1991).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
